findings.title: Owner can burn anyone's tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to burn any user's tokens in the TAsset.sol contract without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner Can Mint Any Amount of Tokens
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted access to mint any amount of tokens in the TAsset.sol contract.

findings.title: Unrestricted Token Minting and Burning
findings.description: FARM_ROLE address can mint any amount of tokens and burn tokens of any address without restrictions in the TWIN.sol contract.

findings.title: Owner can change the oracle contract address
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the oracle contract address in the Minter.sol contract, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change the collateral token address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the collateral token address in the Minter.sol contract without any restrictions.
